ITEM.NAME: name
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the text of the menu item.

ITEM.NAME: url
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the link (URL) of the target page.

ITEM.NAME: target
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the frame or window where the target page opens.

ITEM.NAME: status
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the message displayed on the status bar of the browser.

ITEM.NAME: bgImage
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the background image of the menu item.

ITEM.NAME: bgOverImage
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the background image of the menu item when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: menuBgColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the background color of the menu item.

ITEM.NAME: menuOverColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the background color of the menu item when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: maskColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the mask color of the menu item.

ITEM.NAME: txtClickedColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the text color of a selected menu item.

ITEM.NAME: menuBgClickedColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the background color of a selected menu item.

ITEM.NAME: expand
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether the menu item is expended.

ITEM.NAME: Menu Color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the color of the menu item.

ITEM.NAME: SubTitle Style
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Header Properties

ITEM.NAME: subTitle
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the text of the header.

ITEM.NAME: subTitle_font
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font name.

ITEM.NAME: subTitle_color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font color.

ITEM.NAME: subTitle_size
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font size.

ITEM.NAME: subTitle_bold
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether uses bold font style.

ITEM.NAME: subTitle_italic
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether uses italic font style.

ITEM.NAME: subTitle_underline
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether uses underline font style.

ITEM.NAME: subTitle_align
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the alignment of the header.

ITEM.NAME: subTitle_x_offset
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the X offset of the header text.

ITEM.NAME: subTitle_y_offset
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the Y offset of the header text.

ITEM.NAME: Title Style
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Title Properties

ITEM.NAME: title
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the text of the title.

ITEM.NAME: title_font
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font name.

ITEM.NAME: title_color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font color.

ITEM.NAME: title_size
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font size.

ITEM.NAME: title_bold
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether uses bold font style.

ITEM.NAME: title_italic
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether uses italic font style.

ITEM.NAME: title_underline
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether uses underline font style.

ITEM.NAME: title_align
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the alignment of the title.

ITEM.NAME: title_x_offset
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the X offset of the title text.

ITEM.NAME: title_y_offset
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the Y offset of the title text.

ITEM.NAME: Menu Style
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Item Properties

ITEM.NAME: name
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the text of the menu item.

ITEM.NAME: menu_font
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font name.

ITEM.NAME: menu_color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font color.

ITEM.NAME: menu_size
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font size.

ITEM.NAME: menu_bold
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether uses bold font style.

ITEM.NAME: menu_italic
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether uses italic font style.

ITEM.NAME: menu_underline
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether uses underline font style.

ITEM.NAME: menu_align
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the alignment of the menu item text.

ITEM.NAME: menu_bgcolor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the background color of the menu item.

ITEM.NAME: bar_color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the background color of the header.

ITEM.NAME: image
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the title image of the menu item.

ITEM.NAME: width
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the width of menu item.

ITEM.NAME: height
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the height of menu item.

ITEM.NAME: spacing
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the spacing of menu item.

ITEM.NAME: font
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font name.

ITEM.NAME: fontSize
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font size.

ITEM.NAME: fontColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font color.

ITEM.NAME: fontBold
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether uses bold font style.

ITEM.NAME: align
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the alignment of the text.

ITEM.NAME: xOffset
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the X offset of the text.

ITEM.NAME: yOffset
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the Y offset of the text.

ITEM.NAME: horizontal
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether the menu is displayed horizontally.

ITEM.NAME: font_overcolor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font color when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: arrow_color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the color of the arrow.

ITEM.NAME: menu_color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the background color of the menu item.

ITEM.NAME: menu_overColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the background color when mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: sound
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the sound effect of the menu item.

ITEM.NAME: embedFont
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether uses embeded font.

ITEM.NAME: bar_color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the color of the underline displayed when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: arrow_bgcolor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the background color of the arrow.

ITEM.NAME: menu_alpha
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the transparence of the menu item.

ITEM.NAME: roll_interval
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the openning speed of the menu item.

ITEM.NAME: fontItalic
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether uses italic font.

ITEM.NAME: hasHBar
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether the menu uses square corners.

ITEM.NAME: barLength
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the length of the horizontal bar.

ITEM.NAME: menu_bordercolor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the border color of the menu item.

ITEM.NAME: mask_alpha
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the mask transparence of the menu item.

ITEM.NAME: mask_height
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the height of the mask.

ITEM.NAME: mask_top
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the Y offset of the mask.

ITEM.NAME: mask_left
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the X offset of the mask.

ITEM.NAME: bg_ImageUp
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether the image is displayed under the text.

ITEM.NAME: title_bgAlpha
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the transparence of the background color of the text.

ITEM.NAME: title_highlight
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether uses 3D effect.

ITEM.NAME: image_height
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the height of the image.

ITEM.NAME: title_move
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether the menu item animates when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: hasVBar
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether the menu uses square corners.

ITEM.NAME: point_color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the splitter color of the menu.

ITEM.NAME: shadow
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether the text of the menu item has a shadow.

ITEM.NAME: shadow_color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the shadow color of the text.

ITEM.NAME: shadow_overcolor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the shadow color of the text when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: block_color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the dot color of the menu item.

ITEM.NAME: menu_gradient
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether uses gradient effect.

ITEM.NAME: menu_overgradient
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether uses gradient effect when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: main_color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the background color of the main menu item.

ITEM.NAME: main_font_color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font color.

ITEM.NAME: main_over_color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the background color when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: main_over_fontcolor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font color when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: main_border_color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the border color.

ITEM.NAME: main_over_border_color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the border color when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: main_open_color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the background color when the menu is highlighted.

ITEM.NAME: sub_color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the background color of the sub menu item.

ITEM.NAME: sub_font_color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font color.

ITEM.NAME: sub_over_color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the background color when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: sub_over_fontcolor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font color when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: sub_border_color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the border color.

ITEM.NAME: sub_over_border_color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the border color when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: sub_click_color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the background color when the menu is highlighted.

ITEM.NAME: sub_click_fontcolor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font color when the menu is highlighed.

ITEM.NAME: arrow_over_color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the color of the arrow when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: arrow_open_color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the Color of the arrow when the menu is highlighted.

ITEM.NAME: Item Size
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Contains the size properties of menu items.

ITEM.NAME: Item Font
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Contains the font properties of menu items.

ITEM.NAME: Main Color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Contains the color properties of main menu items.

ITEM.NAME: Sub Color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Contains the color properties of sub menu items.

ITEM.NAME: Arrow Color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Contains the color properties of the arrow.

ITEM.NAME: main_font
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font name.

ITEM.NAME: main_fontsize
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font size.

ITEM.NAME: main_onFontColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font color when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: main_offFontColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font color.

ITEM.NAME: sub_font
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font name.

ITEM.NAME: sub_fontsize
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font size.

ITEM.NAME: sub_onFontColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font color when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: sep_visible
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether a separator is displayed between menu items.

ITEM.NAME: disappeartime
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the delay time before the sub menu disappears when the mouse leaves.

ITEM.NAME: ShowSubStyle
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the sub menu appears when the mouse is clicked or hovers.

ITEM.NAME: sub_offFontColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font color.

ITEM.NAME: menu_width
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the width of the menu.

ITEM.NAME: main_bold
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether uses bold font style on main menu items.

ITEM.NAME: sub_bold
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether uses bold font sytle on sub items.

ITEM.NAME: fadeTime
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the time of fading effect.

ITEM.NAME: lineWidth
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the width of the separator.

ITEM.NAME: main_y_padding
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the Y padding of the main menu.

ITEM.NAME: sub_x_padding
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the X padding of the sub menu.

ITEM.NAME: sub_y_padding
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the Y padding of the sub menu.

ITEM.NAME: Menu Property
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: General Properties

ITEM.NAME: menuType
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether the menu is displayed horizontally or vertically.

ITEM.NAME: CreateHorizBar
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether uses an extra bar to fill the rest space.

ITEM.NAME: menuShowChild
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the sub menu appears when the mouse is clicked or hovers.

ITEM.NAME: itemWidth
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the width of the menu item.

ITEM.NAME: itemHeight
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the height of the menu item.

ITEM.NAME: menuXOffset
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the X offset of the popup menu.

ITEM.NAME: menuYOffset
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the Y offset of the popup menu.

ITEM.NAME: upBgcolor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the background color if there is no gradient effect.

ITEM.NAME: overBgcolor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the background color when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: downBgcolor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the background color when the mouse is clicked.

ITEM.NAME: autoSizeWidth
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether the menu width is adjusted automatically.

ITEM.NAME: Gradient
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Gradient Properties

ITEM.NAME: isGradient
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether the menu is displayed in gradient effect.

ITEM.NAME: g_up_firstColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the start color of the gradient effect.

ITEM.NAME: g_up_secondColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the end color of the gradient effect.

ITEM.NAME: g_over_firstColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the start color of the gradient effect when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: g_over_secondColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the end color of the gradient effect when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: g_down_firstColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the start color of the gradient effect when the mouse is clicked.

ITEM.NAME: g_down_secondColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the end color of the gradient effect when the mouse is clicked.

ITEM.NAME: Menu Font
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font properties.

ITEM.NAME: upFontColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font color.

ITEM.NAME: overFontColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font color when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: downFontColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font color when the mouse is clicked.

ITEM.NAME: txtFont
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font name.

ITEM.NAME: txtSize
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font size.

ITEM.NAME: txtAlign
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the alignment of the text.

ITEM.NAME: itemTextXOffSet
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the left padding of the text.

ITEM.NAME: rightPadding
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the right padding of the text.

ITEM.NAME: isBold
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether the text is bold.

ITEM.NAME: isItalic
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether the text is italic.

ITEM.NAME: SepareteLine Style
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Separator properties of sub menu items.

ITEM.NAME: sepline
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether displays a separator between each sub menu item.

ITEM.NAME: seplineColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the color of the separator.

ITEM.NAME: seplineSize
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the height of the separator.

ITEM.NAME: Border Style
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Border Properties

ITEM.NAME: borderState
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether displays a menu border.

ITEM.NAME: borderColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the color of the border.

ITEM.NAME: borderSize
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the size of the border.

ITEM.NAME: borderEmboss
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether displays a 3D border.

ITEM.NAME: embossDir
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the direction of 3D effect.

ITEM.NAME: Shadow Style
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Shadow Properties

ITEM.NAME: shadowAppear
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether displays a shadow.

ITEM.NAME: shadowOffset
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the offset between the shadow and menu.

ITEM.NAME: Fade Options
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Fading Properties

ITEM.NAME: menuFade
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether uses the fading effect.

ITEM.NAME: fadeRate
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the speed of fading effect.

ITEM.NAME: Auto Hide
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Popup Menu Dispearing Properties

ITEM.NAME: collapseTimeBool
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether the sub menu disappears automatically.

ITEM.NAME: collapseTime
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the delay time before the popup menu disappears when the mouse leaves, in milliseconds.

ITEM.NAME: menuPopDir
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the popup direction of the sub menu.

ITEM.NAME: limitX
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the right boundary when displays a sub menu.

ITEM.NAME: limitY
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the bottom boundary when displays a sub menu.

ITEM.NAME: sound
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the sound effect of the menu.

ITEM.NAME: embedFont
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether the menu uses embeded font.

ITEM.NAME: flash width
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the width of Flash.

ITEM.NAME: flash height
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the height of Flash.

ITEM.NAME: autosize
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether calculates the size of Flash automatically.

ITEM.NAME: page bgColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the background color of the web page.

ITEM.NAME: flash bgColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the background color of the Flash menu.

ITEM.NAME: transparent
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether the Flash menu is transparent.

ITEM.NAME: usexml
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether reads configuration data from an exnternal XML file dynamically.

ITEM.NAME: CaptionStyle
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Text Properties

ITEM.NAME: Align
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the alignment of the text.

ITEM.NAME: CaptionColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the color of the text.

ITEM.NAME: CaptionFocusColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the text color when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: CaptionFontName
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font name.

ITEM.NAME: CaptionFontSize
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font size.

ITEM.NAME: CaptionFontStyle
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font styles.

ITEM.NAME: CaptionsAbove
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether the text is displayed above the image.

ITEM.NAME: Accelerate
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether to accelerate the speed of the image scrollig according to the mouse position.

ITEM.NAME: Spacing
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the spacing between menu items.

ITEM.NAME: ChangeDirection
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether the scroll direction changes depends on the mouse position.

ITEM.NAME: ClickDown
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether the menu item moves down to provide a button like visual feedback when the mouse is clicked.

ITEM.NAME: DefaultTarget
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the default target name.

ITEM.NAME: On Focus
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Hot Properties

ITEM.NAME: BorderColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the border color when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: BorderWidth
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the border width when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: FocusTint
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether displays a transparent mask over the menu item when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: TintColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the mask color of the menu item when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: Load Bar Style
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Preloader Properties

ITEM.NAME: LoadProgressBorderColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the border color of the preloador bar.

ITEM.NAME: LoadProgressFillColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the color of the preloader bar.

ITEM.NAME: LoadText
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the text of the preloader.

ITEM.NAME: LoadTextColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the color of preloader text.

ITEM.NAME: Edge
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Top/Bottom Border Properties

ITEM.NAME: ShowMasks
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether displays a gradient effect on the top/bottom border.

ITEM.NAME: MaskHeight
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the height of the gradient border.

ITEM.NAME: MaskColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the color of the gradient border.

ITEM.NAME: Scroll Setting
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Scrolling Properties

ITEM.NAME: ScrollAmount
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the offset of each movement.

ITEM.NAME: ScrollDelay
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the delay time between each movement, in milliseconds

ITEM.NAME: ScrollFromMouse
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether images move toward or backward to the mouse. This property will be ignored if Direction Switching is false.

ITEM.NAME: StartScrollFrom
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the initial scrolling direction.

ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Main Properties

ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the background color.

ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether uses gradient effect or not.

ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the end color of gradient, and the start color is the background color.

ITEM.NAME: CaptionFocusGradient
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether uses gradient effect when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the end color of gradient when the mouse hovers, and the start color is the background color.

ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether uses bold font when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether uses underline font when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the direction of gradient.

ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font name.

ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font size.

ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font style.

ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the height of menu item.

ITEM.NAME: ItemIndent
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the X offset of the sub menu text.

ITEM.NAME: ItemTextColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the text color.

ITEM.NAME: ItemTextFocusColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the text color when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: ItemTextPressColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the text color when the mouse is pressed.

ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font name.

ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font style.

ITEM.NAME: ItemFocusBold
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether uses bold font when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: ItemFocusUnderline
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether uses underline font when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: ItemHeight
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the height of the sub menu item.

ITEM.NAME: SelectorBorderColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the border color when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: SelectorBorderStyle
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the shape of the border when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: SelectorFillColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the color when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: SelectorGradient
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether uses gradient effect when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: SelectorFillGradientColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the end color of the gradient effect when the mouse hovers. The start color is Hot Color.

ITEM.NAME: SelectorGradientDirection
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the direction of the gradient effect when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: ShowSelectorBorder
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether the border of the menu item is displayed.

ITEM.NAME: ShowSelectorFill
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether the fill color of the menu item is displayed.

ITEM.NAME: SelectedMain
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the menu item that will be expanded initially.

ITEM.NAME: WordWrap
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether the text is wrapped or not.

ITEM.NAME: AnimationSpeed
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the speed of expanding/collapsing animation.

ITEM.NAME: ArrowIndent
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the X offset of the arrow.

ITEM.NAME: DefaultTarget
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the default target frame name.

ITEM.NAME: HoverDelay
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies how long will the menu item opens after the mouse hovers, in milliseconds. This value will be ignored if Hover Sensitive is false.

ITEM.NAME: HoverSensitive
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether the menu item opens when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: ShowArrow
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether the arrow is displayed.

ITEM.NAME: SoundMain
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the sound when the mouse is clicked on the main menu.

ITEM.NAME: SoundItem
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the sound when the mouse is clicked on the sub menu.

ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the indent value of the text.

ITEM.NAME: font_selectedcolor

ITEM.NAME: DefaultLeafIcon
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the icon of a leaf node.

ITEM.NAME: DisclosureClosedIcon
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the icon before a closed folder.

ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the icon before an openned folder.

ITEM.NAME: FolderClosedIcon
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the icon of a closed folder.

ITEM.NAME: FolderOpenIcon
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the icon of an openned folder.

ITEM.NAME: Indentation
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the indent value of each row, in pixels.

ITEM.NAME: OpenDuration
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the duration of the expanding/collapsing animation, in milliseconds.

ITEM.NAME: bgcolor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the background color.

ITEM.NAME: useTheme
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether uses the color define by the color scheme.

ITEM.NAME: theme_color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the color scheme.

ITEM.NAME: rollover_color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the background color of the menu item when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: selection_color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the background color of the menu item selected.

ITEM.NAME: border_style
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the border properties.

ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether the horizontal scroll bar is displayed.

ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the range of the horizontal scrolling.

ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether the vertical scroll bar is displayed.

ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether the menu border is displayed.

ITEM.NAME: border_color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the color of the menu border.

ITEM.NAME: sep_height
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the height of the separator.

ITEM.NAME: bar_height
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the height of the title.

ITEM.NAME: bar_up
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies whether the title is displayed above the image.

ITEM.NAME: move_speed
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the animation speed of the menu.

ITEM.NAME: default_open_menu
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the menu item that selected initially.

ITEM.NAME: shrink_width
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the width of closed menu item.

ITEM.NAME: move_sound
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the sound during the movement of the menu item.

ITEM.NAME: Main_Height
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the height of menu item.

ITEM.NAME: Main_Cursor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the cursor of menu item.

ITEM.NAME: Main_HighlightColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the highlight color of the 3D border.

ITEM.NAME: Main_ShadowColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the lowlight color of the 3D border.

ITEM.NAME: Main_BgGradColor1
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the start color of background gradient.

ITEM.NAME: Main_BgGradColor2
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the end color of background gradient.

ITEM.NAME: Main_HoverBgGradColor1
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the start color of background gradient when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: Main_HoverBgGradColor2
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the end color of background gradient when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: Main_SelBgGradColor1
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the start color of background gradient when the mouse is pressed.

ITEM.NAME: Main_SelBgGradColor2
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the end color of background gradient when the mouse is pressed.

ITEM.NAME: Main_FontName
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font name.

ITEM.NAME: Main_FontSize
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font size.

ITEM.NAME: Main_FontStyle
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font style.

ITEM.NAME: Main_Text_Align
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the alignment of the text.

ITEM.NAME: Main_TextColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the color of the text.

ITEM.NAME: Main_Text_X_Padding
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the X offset of the menu text.

ITEM.NAME: Main_Text_Y_Padding
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the Y offset of the menu text.

ITEM.NAME: Sub_FontName
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font name.

ITEM.NAME: Sub_FontSize
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font size.

ITEM.NAME: Sub_FontStyle
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the font style.

ITEM.NAME: Sub_Spacing
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the spacing between menu items.

ITEM.NAME: Sub_TextColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the color of the item text.

ITEM.NAME: Sub_Text_HoverColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the color of the item text when the mouse hovers.

ITEM.NAME: Sub_Text_Align
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the alignment of the item text.

ITEM.NAME: Sub_Text_X_Padding
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the X offset of the menu text.

ITEM.NAME: Sub_Text_Y_Padding
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the Y offset of the menu text.

ITEM.NAME: Sub_Pic_Align
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the alignment of the item image.

ITEM.NAME: Sub_Pic_X_Padding
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the X offset of the menu image.

ITEM.NAME: Sub_Pic_Height
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the height of the menu image.

ITEM.NAME: Sub_Pic_Width
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the width of the menu image.

ITEM.NAME: Sub_Sel_Margin
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the margin of the selection rectangle.

ITEM.NAME: Sub_Sel_Color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the color of the selection rectangle.

ITEM.NAME: Sub_Sel_ColorAlpha
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the transparence of the selection rectangle.

ITEM.NAME: BgGradColor1
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the start color of the background gradient.

ITEM.NAME: BgGradColor2
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the end color of the background gradient.

ITEM.NAME: GradDirection
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the direction of the gradient effect.

ITEM.NAME: Arrow_BorderColor
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the border color of the arrow.

ITEM.NAME: Arrow_Color
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the color of the arrow.

ITEM.NAME: ScrollArrowPosition
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the position of up/down arrow.

ITEM.NAME: Main_MoveSpeed
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the animation speed of main menu items.

ITEM.NAME: Sub_MoveSpeed
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the animation speed of sub menu items.

ITEM.NAME: SelectedMain
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the index of the initially highlighted main menu item.

ITEM.NAME: Main_ClickSound
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the sound effect for main menu item.

ITEM.NAME: Sub_ClickSound
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the sound effect for sub menu item.

ITEM.NAME: Menu_Height
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the height of the menu.

ITEM.NAME: Menu_Width
ITEM.DESCRIPTION: Specifies the width of the menu.
